resources.string: If you want win the level you have to score a goal. If there is more than one ball on the map, each ball must be in the goal.
You can use these buttons to move the hero.
When you click on this button, the hero will jump.
If you are standing close to the ball you can click this button to go to the shot window.
In shot mode, to kick the ball, drag your finger across the screen (as shown by the yellow bar). The ball will fly in the opposite direction than you dragged your finger across the screen.
To exit the shooting mode and move to the moving mode, click this button.
